CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [2][3][4][5] It has also been demonstrated that low band - gap conjugated polymers with broad absorption of the solar spectrum are promising active layer materials to achieve a high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Low band-gap conjugated polymers

These are the Material Name entities mentioned in the paragraph. The term "conjugated polymers" refers to a class of polymers where the electrons can move freely along the polymer backbone due to the delocalization of pi-electrons. The "low band-gap" modification indicates that these polymers have a smaller energy gap between their valence and conduction bands, making them more efficient at absorbing a broader range of the solar spectrum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Low band-gap conjugated polymers |
